events.title: Maker Session - Beach Themed Resin Art
events.body: Maker Sessions at Nasketucket Bay Vineyard are an opportunity to let your creative juices flow, every other Thursday night. Learn a new craft, taught by a local artisan while you sip wine and create your very own masterpiece to take home! This week's Maker's Session is a Beach Themed Resin Art Class hosted by These Two Crafty Chicks. Choose from three different project options: Charcuterie Board ($65), Trinkey Tray ($45) or Lazy Susan ($85)Tickets include all materials needed to create your work of art that you can take home. Wine and food are not incldued in the ticket price. No outside food or drink is allowed. Wine, drink specials and specialty food items are available to purchase in the vineyard farm store to nosh on during your class. All ages are welcome for this event.

events.title: Fido Friday
events.body:
**Fridays are for Fidoand Flight Specials!**

*Our 4-legged friends are welcome on the patio or green spaces. 15% off wine flights and 15% off "barkuterie" boards from our store for your furry companion.*

events.title: Vino & Vinyasa with The Studio Yoga Instructors
events.body: Get ready to uncork your potential with the Vino & Vinyasa class hosted at the vineyard by instructors from [The Studio @ Mattapoisett Wellness Center](https://www.facebook.com/profile.php?id=100094819986187). Whether you're a downward dog pro or a tree pose newbie, this series is all about savoring the sweet serenity of yoga in a vineyard setting. Tickets must be purchased in advance and include a drink voucher to be enjoyed after your class in the vineyard tasting room.

events.title: Live Music: The Racky Thomas Band
events.body:
Live music by the [Racky Thomas Band](https://www.facebook.com/profile.php?id=100032430986943) from 4-7. $5 cover charge. 

All ages welcome. Dogs allowed on the patio

events.title: Live Music from 2-5: Chip Allen
events.body: Live Music from 2-5: [Chip Allen](https://www.facebook.com/ChipAllenMusic)

events.title: Fido Friday and Phoenix on the Fly Food Truck
events.body:
**Fridays are for Fido, Food Trucks and Flight Specials!**

*Our 4-legged friends are welcome on the patio or green spaces. 15% off wine flights and 15% off "barkuterie" boards from our store for your furry companion. The food truck will be pumping out delicious eats from 3-8.*

**Today's Food Truck: [Phoenix on the Fly ](https://www.facebook.com/profile.php?id=100063697864255)from** ***3-8***

events.title: Vino & Vinyasa from 10-11
events.body: Get ready to uncork your potential with the Vino & Vinyasa class hosted at the vineyard by instructors from [The Studio @ Mattapoisett Wellness Center](https://www.facebook.com/profile.php?id=100094819986187). Whether you're a downward dog pro or a tree pose newbie, this series is all about savoring the sweet serenity of yoga in a vineyard setting. Tickets must be purchased in advance and include a drink voucher to be enjoyed after your class in the vineyard tasting room.

events.title: End of Harvest Celebration!
events.body:
Join us in celebrating the close of another harvest season! Grab a photo in our grape stomp vat!

Live Music: [Craig DeMelo](https://www.facebook.com/TheWhiskeyPoet) from 1-4 and [Blues Alley](https://www.facebook.com/BluesAlleyband) from 5-8

$5 cover charge. All ages welcome. Dogs allowed Outside

Local Vendor Market from 1-7. Shop our pop-up local vendor market for unique and hand crafted items!

Food Trucks from 1-7:

[Phoenix on the Fly](https://www.facebook.com/profile.php?id=100063697864255) 

[Sorbae Frozen Treats](https://www.facebook.com/sorbaefrozentreats)

events.title: Live Music from 2-5: Robert Chandler
events.body: Live Music from 2-5 by [Robert Chandler](https://www.facebook.com/robert.chandler.18847)

events.title: Wine & Seafood Pairing Event!
events.body:
PLEASE NOTE: THIS IS A 21+ ONLY, RAIN OR SHINE EVENT. DUE TO THE FACT THAT THIS IS A PRE-FIXED MENU, WE ARE NOT ABLE TO ACCOMMODATE ANY DIETARY RESTRICTIONS.

Nasketucket Bay Vineyard brings you the collaboration of [The Little Phoenix ](https://www.facebook.com/profile.php?id=100063697864255)and Wine Educator Missa Capozzo of Wine Down Events for a guided seafood and wine pairing experience! During this entertaining guided event, you will learn how and why each wine complements each seafood dish, which will be served fresh off the food truck. In addition, you will learn the fundamentals of wine and food pairing with fun, educational demonstrations.\
The Menu:\
1- Mini Lobster Roll\
2 - Fried Clams \
3 - Scallops wrapped in bacon 

4 - Shrimp Mozambique\
5 - Stuffed Quahog

This event will sell out super quickly. Don't hesitate to get your tickets!

***Limited bottle sales will be allowed for this event.***

events.title: Columbus Day Celebration!
events.body:
Join us for our Columbus Day Celebration with live music from 12-4 by [Mike & Adlie](https://www.facebook.com/adlieandmikeacoustic)

Food Truck: [Travelers On Tour](https://www.facebook.com/profile.php?id=100085405684555)

$5 cover charge. Supervised children allowed. Dogs allowed outside. No reservations or tickets needed.

Maker Sessions at Nasketucket Bay Vineyard are an opportunity to let your creative juices flow, every other Thursday night. Learn a new craft, taught by a local artisan while you sip wine and create your very own masterpiece to take home! This week's Maker's Session is a 9" lighted sea glass christmas tree, hosted by Tracy Churchey from Resin Galore & More. Tickets are $55-65 per person and include all materials needed to create your work of art that you can take home.

Choose between 3 project options at checkout:

Sea Glass Tree - $65

Grinch Tree - $65

Santa Gnome Tree - $55

Wine and food are not incldued in the ticket price. No outside food or drink is allowed. Wine, drink specials and specialty food items are available to purchase in the vineyard farm store to nosh on during your class. All ages are welcome for this event.

events.title: Maker Session: Charcuterie Board with Savor the Spread
events.body: Maker Sessions at Nasketucket Bay Vineyard are an opportunity to let your creative juices flow, every other Thursday night. Learn a new craft, taught by a local artisan while you sip wine and create your very own masterpiece to take home! This Maker Session is a charcuterie board class hosted by Cindy from [Savor the Spread](https://www.facebook.com/savorthespread). Wine and additional food are not included in the ticket price. No outside food or drink is allowed. Wine, drink specials, mock-tails and specialty food items are available to purchase in the vineyard farm store to nosh on during your class! Tickets are $65 and must be purchased in advance.

events.title: Weights & Wine with Ashley Kelley
events.body: Welcome to **Weights and Wine**! Join us at **Nasketucket Bay Vineyard** where we combine the best of both worlds - fitness and relaxation. Get ready to break a sweat with a high-energy workout session, followed by a well-deserved glass of wine to unwind and socialize. This in-person event is the perfect opportunity to meet new friends, enjoy scenic views, and treat yourself. Don't miss out on this unique event that promises to be a blend of fitness, fun, foliage, and fine wine! Tickets are only $30 and include a drink to be enjoyed in our tasting room directly after your class!

events.title: RED PARTY - "Young at Heart" Tempranillo Release Red Party
events.body:
Join us in celebrating the final addition to our wine menu for the 2024 season, our "Young at Heart" Tempranillo! Come wearing red and receive a free sample! We will be co-hosting this event with our favorite vendor, Dianna from [Truffles By D.](https://www.facebook.com/profile.php?id=100067755266779) who will be handing out free samples of truffles to pair with your wine! 

Live music by Mike & Leah! 

Dudes N' Foods food truck!

No tickets or cover charge. Supervised children allowed. Leashed dogs allowed outside.

events.title: CLOSED FOR THANKSGIVING
events.body: WE ARE CLOSED FOR THANKSGIVING

events.title: ORNAMENT MARKET GRAND OPENING
events.body: Join us for the unveiling of our Holiday Ornament Market! Our entire tasting room will be decorated to the max with hundreds of locally crafted, handmade ornaments, and they're all for sale! Grab a glass of wine and stroll through over a thousand lovingly created ornaments and support local artisans. The Holiday Ornament Market will be open during business hours from Friday, November 29th through our season closing date of Sunday, December 22nd.

The Holiday Ornament Market will be open during business hours from Friday, November 29th through our season closing date of Sunday, December 22nd.

events.title: Maker Session: Resin Christmas Tree Ornaments (Set of 3)
events.body:
Maker Sessions at Nasketucket Bay Vineyard are an opportunity to let your creative juices flow, every Thursday night. Learn a new craft, taught by a local artisan while you sip wine and create your very own masterpiece to take home! This week's Maker's Session is a set of 3 beautiful and highly customizable resin ornaments for your Christmas tree, hosted by Andraya Costa from [These Two Crafty Chicks](https://www.facebook.com/thesetwocraftychicks). Tickets are $40 per person and include all materials needed to create your work of art that you can take home.

PLEASE NOTE: Wine and food are not included in the ticket price. No outside food or drink is allowed. Wine, drink specials and specialty food items are available to purchase in the vineyard farm store to nosh on during your class. All ages are welcome for this event.

events.title: Christmas Cookie and Wine Pairing Experience
events.body:
PLEASE NOTE: THIS IS A 21+ ONLY EVENT. DIETARY RESTRICTIONS CAN'T BE ACCOMODATED. OUTSIDE FOOD & DRINK IS PROHIBITED.

Celebrate the holiday season with a guided Wine & Christmas Cookie Pairing Experience featuring locally crafted cookies by Moeshmallows of Marlboro, MA. This isn't your ordinary wine tasting! This is a wonderfully entertaining and educational, guided experience packed with fun demonstrations that will leave you wanting more. During this experience Wine Expert, Missa Capozzo of Wine Down Events will present 5 Nasketucket Bay Vineyard wines paired with 5 freshly baked delicious Christmas cookies, as well as various interactive demonstrations in the fundamentals of wine and food pairing.

events.title: Christmas Movie Trivia Night!
events.body:
Join us for our Christmas Movie Trivia night hosted by our good friend John Healey from 5-7. Prizes will be given to first and second place winning teams. No tickets required. 

Supervised children allowed. Leashed dogs allowed outside.

No cover charge. Supervised children allowed. Leashed dogs allowed outside.

events.title: Maker Session: Chunky-knit Cozy Lap Blanket
events.body:
Join us for our final Maker Session of the season! 

Maker Sessions at Nasketucket Bay Vineyard are an opportunity to let your creative juices flow, every other Thursday night. Learn a new craft, taught by a local artisan while you sip wine and create your very own masterpiece to take home! This Maker Session is a Chunky-knit cozy lap blanket class hosted by Jenny Clark. 

Wine and additional food are not included in the ticket price. **No outside food or drink is allowed**. Wine, drink specials, mock-tails and specialty food items are available to purchase in the vineyard farm store to nosh on during your class!

events.title: CLOSING DAY
events.body:
Parting is such sweet sorrow.... but not to worry! We will be back next season with more wine and events to fill your days in 2025! We will be opening today at 11 and closing at 4 to enjoy a holiday celebration with our fantastic, hard-working employees before we break for the winter. 

Follow us on Facebook for announcements on our season re-opening in April 2025. 

Until next year.... Peace, Love & Vino my friends. Cheers!

events.title: Dudes N' Foods Food Truck
events.body: [Dudes N' Foods ](https://www.facebook.com/profile.php?id=61555812719691)Food Truck from 3-7

events.title: Halloween Party with Daddy-O Rockabilly Band
events.body:
Grab your costume and join us for a fun afternoon of live music by rockabilly band, Daddy-O from 3-6. Games, prizes, costume contest, dancing, pizza and of course.... WINE!

$5 cover charge. Children are allowed but must per supervised at all times. Leashed dogs allowed outside.

events.title: HOLIDAY ORNAMENT MARKET
events.body:
HOLIDAY ORNAMENT MARKET OPEN FROM 11-6

No tickets or reservations required! Our tasting room has been transformed into a beautiful and enchanting Holiday destination. There are 100's of locally hand crafted ornaments on display and they're all for sale! The Holiday Ornament Market is open during normal business hours starting on Friday, November 29th through our season close date of Sunday, December 22nd.

HOLIDAY ORNAMENT MARKET OPEN FROM 11-8

No tickets or reservations required! Our tasting room has been transformed into a beautiful and enchanting Holiday destination. There are 100's of locally hand crafted ornaments on display and they're all for sale! The Holiday Ornament Market is open during normal business hours starting on Friday, November 29th through our season close date of Sunday, December 22nd.

Food from Dudes N Foods Food truck. No cover charge or tickets needed. Supervised children are allowed. Dogs allowed outside only.
